info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 3:16PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Putnam and eastern Allen Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 316 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lima, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Columbus Grove around 330 PM EDT. Bluffton and Pandora around 335 PM EDT. This includes Interstate 75 between mile markers 121 and 141. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
